channel.description: Recent content in dreamhost on Og Maciel's Journal

item.title: Disappointed With Dreamhost Private Server Service
item.description: This year I decided to do something I’ve wanted to do for a very long time: get my own private Linux server! A place where I could have total control (i.e. root access) and be able to install or run anything I wanted! Better yet, I wanted a conary managed system that could leverage all the packaging that I have already done for Foresight Linux and be dead simple to maintain!
